马术运动 Equestrian|无忧教育 ... 73．跳跃： Gambado 75．原地腾跃： Capriole 76．直立腾跃： Curvet;courbette.

list.abs: perform a capriole , of horses in dressage ., 在驯马技术中表演的一个跳跃的动作.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from obsolete French (now cabriole), from Italian capriola 'leap', from capriolo 'roebuck', from Latin capreolus, diminutive of caper, capr- 'goat'

means.word_mean: 1. (dressage) a vertical jump of a trained horse with a kick of the hind legs at the top of the jump
1. perform a capriole, of horses in dressage
